page.title: 17TIBBERTON -EDGMOND FAREWELL
page.content: Our area is largely agricultural yet the majority of inhabitants do not work on the land. They live here because they love{village life}and the countryside, though their work is in nearby towns. In both villages the{ {Church}plays an active part and so do traditional organisations like the Womens Institute, Mothers Union, Guides, Brownies and Football clubs. Both communities take great care of the elderly and run clubs for them to meet and enjoy themselves. We found we had collected far too much information about our area to put into the computer. This information was collected by Form 3 of{Newport Girls' High School, {Shropshire,}with the help of some of the Lower 6 and Mrs R Taylor, Mr W Casson, Mrs S Cunningham and Mrs A Warner.
